column1: Once upon a time, in a barn near a farm house, there lived a little white kitten named @entity0. @entity0 lived high up in a nice warm place above the barn where all of the farmer's horses slept.  But @entity0 was not alone in her little home above the barn, oh no. She shared her hay bed with her mommy and Five other sisters. All of her sisters were cute and fluffy, like @entity0. But she was the only white one in the bunch. The rest of her sisters were all orange with beautiful white tiger stripes like @entity0's mommy. Being different made @entity0 quite sad. She often wished she looked like the rest of her family. So one day, when @entity0 found a can of the old farmer's orange paint, she used it to paint herself like them. When her mommy and sisters found her they started laughing.  "What are you doing, @entity0?!"  "I only wanted to be more like you".  @entity0's mommy rubbed her face on @entity0's and said "Oh @entity0, but your fur is so pretty and special, like you. We would never want you to be any other way". And with that, @entity0's mommy picked her up and dropped her into a big bucket of water. When @entity0 came out she was herself again. Her sisters licked her face until @entity0's fur was all all dry.  "Do not ever do that again, @entity0!" they all cried. "Next time you might mess up that pretty white fur of yours and we would not want that!" Then @entity0 thought, "I change my mind. I like being special".
@placeholder did @entity0 do to herself that made her mommy and sisters laugh
she painted herself orange and white
she painted herself black and blue
she painted herself orange and white
she painted green stripes on herself
she painted herself pink and purple
